name: Gun Ur Buddy!
description:
SPAMMING BUTTON GLITCH - Patched!

UPDATE: Now with 2Player Mode!!! Also, fixed the GameOver to Round Over!

You are in the cold, frozen mountains of Canada! With little to nothing to do, you find two revolvers. Needless to say, you and your buddy decide to play Russian Roulette!

Do you have the guts?

Credits:

  • Music - Shalpin & Android128
  • Player Voices - Michel Baradari
  • Narrator - Kenney
  • Gun - Gary & Michel Baradari
  • Name Input Script - Soma
